title: 我装CJB怎么报错啊
author: wxj541374210
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.




--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7eff9643 --------
Generated 12-7-21 下午8:00

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.7.0_04, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce GT 520/PCIe/SSE2/3DNOW! version 4.2.0, NVIDIA Corporation

java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: isDefaultTexture
        at forge.ForgeHooksClient.beforeBlockRender(ForgeHooksClient.java:264)
        at ct.a(WorldRenderer.java:210)
        at l.a(RenderGlobal.java:1461)
        at lr.a(EntityRenderer.java:1070)
        at lr.b(EntityRenderer.java:907)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(Minecraft.java:873)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:750)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 768cedde ----------

可以进游戏，但进不了世界
mod文件夹里的压缩包全都放进了mods里

我装了forge所以装了FORGE专用的
那个加进32X材质包的我不知道怎么装，我没装任何材质包
求解啊

replies.author: oomanj
replies.txt_content: LZ安装失败了，要我给个吗
